title: Ae/Pr视觉特效+转场BCC插件包 2019 v12.0.3 Win
author: 大众脸
content: Boris Continuum Complete（BCC）是专为Adobe After Effects和Premiere Pro设计的全面视觉特效与转场插件包。该版本支持从CS6到CC 2019的多个Adobe软件版本，提供超过百种特效效果，涵盖3D字幕、粒子系统、老电影风格、光线、镜头光晕、烟雾、火焰等视觉效果，并包含调色、键控抠像、遮罩、跟踪及发光等高级工具。2019版本引入了全新功能：重生的Particle Illusion幻影粒子插件、Title Studio文字处理着色器（支持发光、射线、模糊）、Mocha Essentials工作区及多项新工具，实现更快的跟踪与遮罩操作，整体支持GPU加速。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS6 – CC 2019, Premiere Pro CS6 – CC 2019

other.update_notes: Continuum 2019 is the latest major upgrade for the most comprehensive plug-in collection on the market. Key features include the rebirth of Particle Illusion, the famed motion graphics generator, new Title Studio image-processing shaders such as glows, rays, and blurs for visually-stunning titles and lower thirds, new Mocha Essentials workspace with 4 new spline tools like magnetic edge snapping and geometric shapes for faster tracking and masking, new point-driven parameter tracking powered by Mocha, and overall GPU-acceleration.
installation_instructions: 卸载旧版本，然后安装Continuum_2019_Adobe_12_0_3_Windows.exe插件程序，安装过程中选择No License
复制注册补丁文件夹里面的4个dll文件到C:\Program Files\BorisFX\ContinuumAE\12\lib 完成替换注册
完成安装，打开软件使用插件
